bugs: Fixed an issue where flow.stop() did not return the flow object it was called on if the flow was already stopped.
Flows no longer collect references to pipeline callbacks that are added after the flow has stopped.

improvements: The until() function now returns a proper Promise object, supporting manually calling .then() on them.
Added an error message for elements with both an #if and #for attribute (development build only).
Minor performance improvements for effect(), live.link(), monitoring live variables, component internals, and in-template logic.
bugs: When using the #for attribute on a <template> element, it now renders the template's contents rather than the template element itself.
Fixed an issue where non-element nodes between elements in an #if-else chain were not removed.

improvements: Major performance improvements to in-template logic parsing.
Added several error and warning messages for mistakes in in-template logic (development build only).
bugs: Fixed an issue where the 'has' trap on live variables throws an error if the value wrapped is nullish.
Fixed a memory leak where a monitor.ignore() was preventing references to internal rendering flows from being cleaned up.

breaking: The elements object has been renamed and restructured to query() and query.all().

improvements: Dev builds are not longer minified.
bugs: Fixed an issue where shadowless components would break after connecting for a second time.

improvements: register() now accepts URL objects as first argument.

breaking: track() has been renamed to monitor().

Tracking shorthands like track.undo() and track.live() have been removed in favor of the more general monitor(['undo'], () => { â€¦ }) and likewise for other types. Registering new types will also no longer create shorthands.

improvements: Added flow.await(), a method that waits for its callback before sending a trigger through to the next item in the pipline.

bugs: Fixed an issue where the deepchange event did not fire on the changed live variable itself.
